Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Lament and the Ghost Town's Fate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Nan and her disillusionment, her interaction with a skeptical man, and the looming threat to the ghost town, setting the stage for personal and external conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Lament
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes Nan's character and her internal conflict through her monologue in a saloon setting.

sub_scenes.title: Departure and Ghost Town Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene transitions from the saloon to the ghost town, introducing new characters and the central conflict of airport construction.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Ghost Town and Development Plans

Major_Arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Misunderstandings & Ghost Town Demolition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan and Cal's evolving relationship amidst the backdrop of the ghost town's demolition, exploring themes of misjudgment, deeper feelings, and resistance.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Misjudgment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan and Cal's intimate conversation where Nan re-evaluates Cal's romantic sensibilities.

sub_scenes.title: Ghost Town Demolition and Resistance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts back to the ghost town, showing the demolition and Nan's emotional resistance to it.

Major_Arcs.title: Family Conflict and Emotional Distress
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Nan's conflict with her father over business and horses, leading to emotional distress and seeking comfort from family.

sub_scenes.title: Business Interruption and Horse Labor
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces business discussions and the topic of horses for construction work, setting up conflict with her father.

sub_scenes.title: Mother's Comfort and Nan's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan seeking comfort from her mother and resolving to confront Cal.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Seek Clarity from Cal

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Father's Business Directive
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan pursuing Cal and being intercepted by her father with business instructions.

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation, Separation, and Reconciliation with Cal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Nan and Cal's confrontation over horses and their relationship, their separation, Nan's loneliness, and eventual reconciliation amidst a snowstorm.

sub_scenes.title: Ultimatum and Defiance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan confronting Cal and giving him an ultimatum regarding their relationship and the horses.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Loneliness and Reflection on Cal's Absence

sub_scenes.title: Reconciliation and Weather Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Nan and Cal reconciling and then facing the new crisis of severe weather.

Major_Arcs.title: Weather Crisis and Community Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalating weather crisis, the community's reaction, and Cal's decisive action to help.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Reports and Cattlemen's Worry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the severity of the snowstorm and its impact on the cattlemen and communication.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Mr. Wills' and Weather Report
Historical Context of Severe Snow and Impending Starvation
Cal's Resolve to Save the Cattle

sub_scenes.title: Hopelessness and Aerial Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the town's despair and the sudden hope brought by the arrival of a plane with fodder.

narrative_arcs.title: Sound of a Plane and Hopeful Discovery
Fodder from the Plane and Seeds of Romance

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Chane Benson and Town Drama
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and his violent presence in town, sparking different reactions and setting up future conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Benson's Showdown and Town Gossip
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chane Benson's violent act and the varied reactions of the townspeople.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Reactions

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Hero Worship and Clyde's Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Jeff's character and his fascination with guns and violent figures, contrasted with Clyde's more mature perspective.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Reflection on Jeff's Youth and Clyde's Commentary
Jeff's Defensive Outburst and Clyde Insult
Sally and Clyde's Worries About Jeff's Behavior
Sally's Flashback of Jeff's Troubling Past
Introduction to Mr. Benson and Ominous Advice

sub_scenes.title: Article Controversy and Benson's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene revolves around Clyde's article about Benson, the town's reaction, and Benson's calculated response.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Deception and Violent Confrontation with Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the deceptive dinner invitation to Benson, revealing his manipulative nature and culminating in a violent confrontation and Sally's reaction.

sub_scenes.title: Superficial Politeness and Underlying Tension
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the seemingly polite dinner with Benson, masking underlying tensions and ulterior motives.

Major_Arcs.title: Aftermath of Assault and Pursuit to Save Clyde
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the immediate aftermath of Benson's assault, Sally's revelation about Benson's identity, and Jeff's determined pursuit to save Clyde.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Revelation and Jeff's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Sally explaining the situation to Jeff, including the shocking revelation about Benson.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Threat and Assertion of Dominance
Sally's Rage, Chane's Departure, and Warning about Clyde
Jeff's Determined Pursuit to Save Clyde
Confrontation and Er's Plea for Restraint

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Benson Conflict and New Beginnings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the resolution of the conflict with Benson through a fistfight, Clyde's safety, and a hopeful outlook for the future of Jeff and Clyde's journalistic endeavors.

sub_scenes.title: Fair Fight and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the fistfight between Jeff and Benson as a resolution, and the immediate aftermath.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Explanation to Sis about Clyde
Sally and Clyde's Conversation about Headline Change
Office Discussion: Newspaper Edition and Lessons Learned

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Conflict and Steve Daley's Arrival
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new setting at a ranch and a conflict involving whip violence and the arrival of Steve Daley, setting up ranch-related tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Whip Fight and Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene opens with a whip fight and then introduces Steve Daley and his role at the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Betsy's Job and Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Skepticism and Range War Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy's skepticism about Steve and introduces the looming threat of a range war.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of a Ride and Polite Refusal

Major_Arcs.title: Escalating Ranch Conflict and Betsy's Decision
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the escalating conflict with Fred Bridges, Betsy's confrontation, and her realization about Steve Daley's true role and her evolving feelings.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the direct confrontation between Betsy and Fred Bridges and the ensuing fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Fight

sub_scenes.title: Realization and Change of Heart
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Betsy's realization about Steve being a bodyguard and her changing feelings about him.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Realization and Decision about Steve Daley
Betsy's Change of Heart Regarding Firing Steve
Hank's Gratitude and Betsy's Suggestion for Personal Thanks

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve's Romantic Dilemma
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the developing romance between Betsy and Steve, complicated by Steve's gunfighter identity and Betsy's conditions.

sub_scenes.title: Conditions and Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Betsy setting conditions for Steve's job and then confessing her true feelings.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Conflicted Feelings about Steve's Gunslinger Identity
Declaration of Love and the Dilemma of Steve's Identity
Steve's Stance and Betsy's Plea for Love
Betsy's Unconditional Love and Steve's Wavering Resolve

sub_scenes.title: Impending Trouble and Betsy's Assertiveness
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts back to ranch conflicts and Betsy's assertive handling of potential threats.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Conflict and Gunfighter Identity

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Reflection and Impending Action
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Steve's internal thoughts and the build-up to decisive action in response to the ranch conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Justification and Steve's Reluctant Agreement
The Silent Journey and Cessation of Gunfire

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the confrontation at Devil's Pass, the argument over the captive, and the eventual resolution and romantic reunion of Betsy and Steve.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Accusation

Major_Arcs.title: New Ranch Trouble and Carrie's Love Dilemma
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new ranch conflict concerning range boundaries and shifts to Carrie's personal dilemma regarding her feelings for Dave and Fred.

sub_scenes.title: Argument about Dave and New Ranch Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a personal argument and transitions to a new ranch conflict involving range boundaries.

sub_scenes.title: Fence Line Confrontation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the confrontation at the fence line and its immediate resolution through the daughter's assertive intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Apologies and Reassurance After the Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Reflection and Fred's Reappearance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Carrie and Dave's romantic development and is disrupted by the ominous reappearance of Fred Gordon.

Major_Arcs.title: Betrayal and Carrie's Triumph over Fred
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on Fred's betrayal, Carrie's angry confrontation and rejection of him, and her ultimate business triumph over Fred and Carlton.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Betrayal Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's assertive response to Fred and the unveiling of Fred's selfish motives.

narrative_arcs.title: Dave's Support and Carrie's Confession of Love
Reflections on Past Misunderstandings and a Romantic Proposal
Fred's Strategic Proposition and Carrie's Initial Reaction
The Unveiling of Fred's Selfish Motives and Carrie's Betrayal
Carrie's Angry Confrontation and Rejection of Fred
The Confrontation with Fred and Dave's Unexpected Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Business Victory and Dave's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's successful confrontation with Carlton, her business victory, and her subsequent strained encounter and separation from Dave.

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie's Illness and Romantic Resolution with Dave
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows Carrie's illness, the revelation of Fred's true intentions from Carlton, and ultimately a romantic resolution with Dave.

sub_scenes.title: Illness and Carlton's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's illness and Mr. Carlton's visit, revealing Fred's true intentions and clearing his name.

narrative_arcs.title: Carlton's Account of Fred's Visit and Carrie's Rejection
Dave's Interrogation and Carrie's Love Confession
Dave's Pragmatic Advice and Carrie's Emotional Turmoil
Dave's Persuasion and Carrie's Plea for Affection

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Rance's Story of Escape and Love
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Dirk and Rance's story, depicting their escape, pursuit, confrontation, moral dilemma, and ultimate romantic resolution in Mexico.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Pursuit Realization
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene initiates Dirk and Rance's storyline with Dirk realizing they are being pursued.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Questioning at the Ranch
Shift in Stance and Temporary Truce
Evolving Relationship - Night Encounter and Recognition
Retrospective on Evasion Attempts and the Marshal's Ambush
Decision to Leave the Marshal and Reflection

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Recovery and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes Dirk and Rance's story with Rance's recovery, mutual confessions, and a marriage proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Love and Proposal Tease

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day and Dirk's Unexpected Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the wedding day preparations and Dirk's dramatic interruption of the ceremony.

narrative_arcs.title: Walking Down the Aisle and Dirk's Arrival
Marshal's Wedding Gift and Dirk's Fate
Final Remarks on Dirk and Rance's Taste
